---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
function1 <- function(argument) 
{
  argument %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = Percentile)) +
  facet_wrap('year') +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank())
}
```

```{r}
function2 <- function(argument) 
{
  arransubsect %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf() +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=45, hjust = 1)) +
  geom_sf(data= argument, aes(fill = DataZone))
}
```

```{r}
function3 <- function(argument) 
{
  argument %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = arransubsect) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = Percentile)) +
  facet_wrap('year') +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank())
}
```

Trying to apply function to each value in list.
```{r}
ArranPre2016 <- c(S01004409,S01004372,S01004353,S01004352,S01004351,S01004350,S01004349)
function1(ArranPre2016)

lapply(ArranPre2016, function1)
```
